title: Data-Driven Portfolio & Storytelling Engine
description: A sophisticated, single-page application designed to deliver rich, narrative-driven case studies. Built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it uses a data-driven architecture to dynamically showcase diverse creative and technical work through three distinct storytelling experiences.
role: Full Stack Developer, System Architect, UX Designer
pitch: A sophisticated, data-driven portfolio system that transforms static showcases into immersive, narrative-driven experiences tailored to different creative mediums.
challenge: Creating a flexible, maintainable portfolio system that could handle diverse project types (art, writing, code) while providing unique, medium-appropriate user experiences without relying on frameworks or build tools.
development: Built with a content-first workflow using Markdown templates, automated project discovery, and a modular CSS architecture. Implemented three distinct storytelling modes with specialized features for each medium type, ensuring optimal user experience across all project categories.
outcome: A robust, scalable portfolio system that automatically adapts to different project types, provides rich interactive experiences, and maintains excellent performance through vanilla JavaScript and optimized architecture.
